appinfo_list.value: FNF for Friday Night Funkin Mods

app_descript:
Brief: Dive into the rhythmic world of "FNF for Friday Night Funkin Mods," where music and challenge intertwine to provide an electrifying gaming experience. This game offers unique modes for all levels of play, inviting you to tap along to beats or engage in friendly rhythm battles on the same device.
